algorithms.RSSalg.GA

Class GAThresholdOptimiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.RSSalg.GA.GAThresholdOptimiser

  • public class GAThresholdOptimiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of genetic algorithm used for threshold optimization of RSSalg and RSSalgbest from the paper (chapter 3.1):

    J. Slivka, A. Kovacevic, Z. Konjovic: "Combining Co-Training with Ensemble Learning for Application on Single-View Natural Language Datasets". Acta Polytechnica Hungarica 10 (2)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GAThresholdOptimiser(ClassifierEnsembleList classifierStatistics, CoTrainingData data, int fold)
      Creates the new instance of GAThresholdOptimiser

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Candidate run()
      Run the genetic algorithm for threshold pair optimization in RSSalg
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the string that represents the current generation of the candidate

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GAThresholdOptimiser

        public GAThresholdOptimiser(ClassifierEnsembleList classifierStatistics,
                    CoTrainingData data,
                    int fold)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates the new instance of GAThresholdOptimiser
        Parameters:
        classifierStatistics - Statistics (instance ids, predictions and confidences for each prediction) about the instances labeled during the algorithm execution
        data - Data (labeled, unlabeled and test instances) used in the experiment. Makes a deep copy of the data, so the original object is not modified
        fold - Current fold in fold-cross validation experiment
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there was an error during merging of the views (the final classifier in RSSalg uses a unique attribute set)

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string that represents the current generation of the candidate
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • run

        public Candidate run()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Run the genetic algorithm for threshold pair optimization in RSSalg
        Returns:
        the best candidate (found optimum)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there was an error during evaluation of the threshold pair candidates
